defaults.jafontcss: font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic", "MS UI Gothic", Mincho, sans-serif;
defaults.zhfontcss: font-family: PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, "Microsoft YaHei New", "Microsoft Yahei", "微软雅黑", 宋体, SimSun, STXihei, "华文细黑", sans-serif;
defaults.zhhansfontcss: font-family: PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, "Microsoft YaHei New", "Microsoft Yahei", "微软雅黑", 宋体, SimSun, STXihei, "华文细黑", sans-serif;
defaults.zhhantfontcss: font-family: "微軟正黑體", "Microsoft JhengHei", "Microsoft JhengHei UI", "微軟雅黑", "Microsoft YaHei", "Microsoft YaHei UI", sans-serif;
defaults.kofontcss: font-family: "Nanum Barun Gothic", "New Gulim", "새굴림", "애플 고딕", "맑은 고딕", "Malgun Gothic", Dotum, "돋움", "Noto Sans CJK KR", "Noto Sans CJK TC", "Noto Sans KR", "Noto Sans TC", sans-serif;
